entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
